title: Income Restricted ADA 1-Bed  – Priced Well Below Market Prices
posting_body: ['Orchards Apartments - MARLBOROUGH MA, 01752', '$1,828/Month ♦ 1-Bedroom/1-Bath ♦ 80% AMI', 'Please copy and paste the URL into your browser and fill out the online application:', '<URL>', 'Orchard Apartments', 'Orchards Apartments, Income Restricted apartment rentals that offer community-focused amenities, resident events, and a dedicated management and maintenance team.', 'Located minutes from excellent dining and shopping destinations.', 'Amenities & Features', 'Air Conditioning ♦', 'In-Unit Washer & Dryer ♦', 'Dishwasher ♦', 'Granite Countertops ♦ Parking included with garages available ♦ Garbage Disposal ♦', 'Comfortable clubroom with full kitchen and fireplace ♦ Microwave ♦', 'Multiple on-site fitness spaces ♦ Wheelchair Access ♦ Outdoor pool with sundeck and picnic area ♦ Playground and walking trails ♦', 'Clubhouse ♦ Outdoor patio and grilling stations ♦', 'Pet-friendly ♦ Elevators ♦ Fitness Center ♦', 'On-site dog park ♦', 'On-site management ♦ 24-hour maintenance ♦', 'Location', '3 Farmhouse Ln,, MARLBOROUGH, MA, USA', 'Actual floor plans of available vacancies may vary.', ' You will be provided the actual floor of the available apartment if we reach you on the waitlist.', 'Additional Information', 'Maximum of 2 pets per unit.', 'There is a fee of:', 'Cat: $75 per month', 'Dog: $75 per month.', 'Breed restrictions apply.']
